name: Mow.io
description:
Get ready to Mow the world and shape it as you wish to!
Enter the race to mow all things in sight: grass, flowers, park benches...sheds...trees...cars...skyscrapers...EVERYTHING is fair game, even other mowers!!

* 3 Game modes:
Classic: Be the biggest mower
Solo: Mow as much as the map as you can
Battle: Be the last mower standing!
* Multiple maps to discover
* Unlock fun new skins by completing missions
